type: public relations agency supporting the national housing council
short_summary: Public relations support services for NHC to promote housing initiatives
description: The contract seeks to provide public relations services to support NHC through the implementation of its housing initiatives and encourage private sector investment and public support for affordable housing.  During the contract term services will be provided for a period of three years with an option of two extensions up to a maximum of five years.  Mandatory application documents will include a proprietary application, partners information on integrated green and climate-resilient project GHGP commitment and past experience on National Instruments Limited behaviour safety records, respondent reliability survey certificates, political contribution activities education payment
date_posted: There is no bid opening date scheduled for this tender.
